make_image.description.message: With this action you can make an image from a hard disk which boot with PXE mode, and the directory to save Images in server is /net/OpenSysClone/imagenes

restore_image.description.message: With this action you can restore a hard disk image from server to others computers which boot with PXE mode. This action is good for one or two actions at same time in other case you would have to use Multicast Mode.
